data.name: Pierre's Adventures in French - Hint Book
data.detailed_description: This is a hint book for Pierre's Adventures in French. It does not include the original game. This book will help you solve the most difficult puzzles. It's in French with helpful pictures. Purchasing this DLC is a great way to support the developers of Pierre's Adventures in French.
data.about_the_game: This is a hint book for Pierre's Adventures in French. It does not include the original game. This book will help you solve the most difficult puzzles. It's in French with helpful pictures. Purchasing this DLC is a great way to support the developers of Pierre's Adventures in French.

fullgame.name: Pierre's Adventures in French - Learn French

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720, 32-bit colour
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.5 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720, 32-bit colour
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
